#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ 
   long long n,m=1,sum=0,j;
      cin>>n;
      while(n/m-(n/(m+1)+1)>=1)
      {  
      sum=sum+m*(n/m-n/(m+1))*(n/(m+1)+n/m+1)/2;
      m++;
      }
      for(j=1;j<=n/m;j++)
      {
         sum=sum+j*(n/j);
         }
      cout<<sum<<endl;
       return 0;
    }
